title: Akatsuki No Majo Reishi Wa Jiyu Ni Ikitai Mao Tobatsu O Oeta Node, Nonbiri O Mise O Hirakimasu
alternative_title: 暁の魔女レイシーは自由に生きたい～魔王討伐を終えたので、のんびりお店を開きます～ ; Akatsuki no Majo Reishi wa Jiyū ni ikitai maō tōbatsu o oeta node, nonbiri o mise o hirakimasu ; Lacey, Sang Penyihir Fajar, Ingin Hidup Bebas ~Setelah Mengalahkan Raja Iblis, Aku akan Membuka Toko dengan Santai~ ; Lacey the Dawn Witch Wants a Free Life ~After Defeating the Demon King, I'll Open a Cozy Shop~ ; Akatsuki no Majo Reishi wa Jiyuu ni Ikitai ~Maou Toubatsu o Oeta no de, Nonbiri Omise o Hirakimasu~
status: 暁の魔女レイシーは自由に生きたい～魔王討伐を終えたので、のんびりお店を開きます～ ; Akatsuki no Majo Reishi wa Jiyū ni ikitai maō tōbatsu o oeta node, nonbiri o mise o hirakimasu ; Lacey, Sang Penyihir Fajar, Ingin Hidup Bebas ~Setelah Mengalahkan Raja Iblis, Aku akan Membuka Toko dengan Santai~ ; Lacey the Dawn Witch Wants a Free Life ~After Defeating the Demon King, I'll Open a Cozy Shop~ ; Akatsuki no Majo Reishi wa Jiyuu ni Ikitai ~Maou Toubatsu o Oeta no de, Nonbiri Omise o Hirakimasu~
description:
Description :
        The witch Lacey has been under the control of the state since she was a child because of her excessively strong magical power. After defeating the Demon King with the heroes, her only remaining role was to give birth to a child who would inherit her magical powers. However, her fiancé's infidelity was discovered just as their marriage was about to take place. With the help of Wayne, the hero who traveled with her, Lacey's life takes a turn.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1: Grasping The Astelle Staff
